about_the_game:
/tilt/ is a top-down racing game with freeform movement, an upgradable spaceship and a time-traveling explosion mystery


🎮 An expressive three-button control scheme 🕹
You'll weave, paddle, drift, and boost your way around moons and into planets to discover what fate lies at the end of the solar system.

🪐 Open-ended Track Design 🗺
Don't like the track you're racing off? Fly off it! With nothing but your ships energy levels stopping you're invited to find and invent new shortcuts on the exploitation friendly race tracks.

🚀Upgrade your spaceship💥
Upgrade and expand your moveset. Clearing each of the 6 solar systems will enhance your ships moveset.

⏳ Compete in Time Attacks ⌛️
Download the ghosts of your friends or your competition and fight out for the global high-scores on a track, system and game-wide leaderboards.
